name: 1dsound
author: RWCox
description: Program to create a sound file from a 1D file (column of numbers).

inputs.name: Time series file
inputs.description: The input 1D time series file containing the data to transform into sound.

inputs.name: Output prefix
inputs.description: Prefix for the output filename, which will have '.au' extension.

inputs.name: Time per X-mod
inputs.description: Time in seconds per time point in 'tsfile'. Allowed range is 0.01 to 1.0 (inclusive). [default is 0.2s]

inputs.name: Frequency modulation
inputs.description: Output sound is frequency modulated between 110 and 1760 Hz from min to max in the input 1D file.

inputs.name: Notes option
inputs.description: Output sound is a sequence of notes, low to high pitch based on min to max in the input 1D file. Uses pentatonic scale.

inputs.name: Note wave shape
inputs.description: Shape of the notes used. Select from [sine, sqsine, square, triangle].

inputs.name: Despike
inputs.description: Apply a simple despiking algorithm to avoid artifacts from large/small values in the input.

inputs.name: Play
inputs.description: Plays the sound file after it is written.
